name: Minimalist Bici Moto
description:
The Minimalist Bici Moto is a smaller version of the original Bici Moto Bag. This bag is designed to be mounted on motorcycles and/or bicycles. 

100% Hand-Crafted from start to finish. Made of 9 oz veg tan leather, completely hand stitched using the saddle stitch and hand stained.

The Minimalist Bici Moto bag dimensions are 6.5" wide x 6" hight with 1 3/4" gussets. Made to fit small necessities such as tools, wallet, phone, camera and anything else you can think of.

This bag can be mounted on to a motorcycle or a bicycle rack as a pannier bag and once you are off of your bike, it can be attached to your belt. It is great for carrying your phone, energy bars, chain oil or whatever your necessities might be. We can make it fit any motorcycle or bicycle, simply send us a message with a short description of how you want to mount the bag on your motorcycle or bicycle and if possible attach a photo.

The straps on the back of the bag are removable for better adjustment.

name: Commuter Hip Pouch
description:
Hand-tooled leather hip pouch. Perfect for wearing while riding your bike around the city, or for going to concerts, theme parks or simply for everyday use. Unisex leather hip pouch.

Similar to our regular "Leather Hop Pouch" the "Commuter Hip Pouch" is a bit larger for more storage space for those who want to carry a few more things or a few larger items. This bag was designed with cyclists in mind. Perfect for those who don't like riding with a backpack yet want to carry a few items. Accesible and easy to use while riding or walking. This bag is hand sewn, cut, and stained.

The Hip Pouch dimensions are 6.5" (width) x 6" (height)
it also has 1 3/4" gussets for more room inside.

Available in mahogany, tan, brown or black.

EACH ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER in my workshop in Los Angeles, CA. <3

name: Leather Saddle Bag
description:
Hand-tooled leather saddle bag. Straps on to most bike saddles. 

This bag was designed with cyclists in mind. Perfect for short trips to the store, a friends house or even a trip to work. Holds everything you need, wallet, phone, keys, and even your glasses. It is designed with straps with buckles to make it easy to attach and detach from your bike, it can even be attached to your belt! 

The Saddle Bag dimensions are 6.5" (width) x 4 3/4" (height) 
it also has 1 3/4" gussets for more room inside.

Available in mahogany, tan, brown or black. (the bags in the photos is Mahogany)

EACH ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER in my workshop in Los Angeles, CA. <3

name: U-Lock Holster
description:
Hand-tooled leather U-Lock holster. Made in the U.S.A.

This U-Lock holster is built to be durable, comfortable and simple to use. Simply attach to your belt (fits belt sizes with a maximum width of 2 1/2") and drop your U-lock in.

Available in mahogany, saddle tan, brown, or black. Please specify in the "message to seller" if you have a preference. (The Holster in the photo is stained Mahogany)

EACH ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER in my workshop in Los Angeles, CA. <3

name: Top Tube Bag
description:
Hand-tooled leather bag for your bicycle, also called The Top Tube Bag.

This bag is designed to fit almost any top tube size, it has adjustable straps with screws for more security. Easy to screw on and off of your bike, easy to access while on your bike, and a thin design so that you don't have to worry about it rubbing on your legs while riding. Perfect for those who don't like riding with a backpack yet want to carry a few items. This bag is hand sewn, cut, and stained. When you order you also receive 3 extra screw sets in case one or three get lost.

The Top Tube Bag dimensions are 9.5" (width) x 7" (length) 
it also has 2" gussets for more room inside.

Available in "mahogany, tan, brown, black, or unfinished natural. Please specify in the "message to seller" if you have a preference.

EACH ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER in my workshop in Los Angeles, CA. <3

NOTE FOR PURCHASES BEING SHIPPED OUTSIDE THE U.S.A. , Once you purchase you will receive an email from us with the cost of shipping + a shipping cost invoice. The cost of shipping depends on your location.
